metadata.title: STM32L431 Smart Door/Radar UI - State and Menu Flow
metadata.summary: Structured flowchart of system idle, main menu, radar config, calibration, and Do Not Disturb paths with flash-config save and status updates.

nodes.title: System boot and idle initialization
nodes.summary: System powers up, initializes, and enters SYSTEM_IDLE, preparing for low-power mode after startup.

nodes.title: SYSTEM_IDLE
nodes.summary: Idle display off; after ~2 seconds: disconnect BLE, gate NMOS, enter low power, and clear OLED.

nodes.title: MENU_ACTIVE - Main icon menu
nodes.summary: Displays the three-icon main menu and processes user navigation/selection.
nodes.detail: Navigation: Key1 left, Key3 right, Key2 to confirm. Long-press Key3 enters Do Not Disturb (silent). Long-press Key2 opens Door Calibration flow.

nodes.title: Do Not Disturb (Silent)
nodes.summary: Silent DND mode with no on-screen notice; exit on any key press; HC15 may send status messages.

nodes.title: Do Not Disturb (Active with motion notice)
nodes.summary: Non-silent DND with on-screen Do Not Disturb notice shown after PIR motion; exit on any key press.

nodes.title: Radar Config Menu
nodes.summary: Begin radar parameter configuration for user_id = 1 (load defaults if needed).

nodes.title: Radar Config - Angle/Speed/Auto Close
nodes.summary: Edit angle (3 levels), speed (3 levels), and Auto Close flag; provide Save/Exit options.

nodes.title: Saving radar config to flash
nodes.summary: Show progress while writing user config to internal flash (CRC verification performed).

nodes.title: Radar Config Save - Success
nodes.summary: Config saved successfully; show success message and return to main menu.

nodes.title: Radar Config Save - Failure
nodes.summary: Config save failed (CRC or flash error); return to main menu.

nodes.title: Door Calibration Entry
nodes.summary: Begin maximum-open calibration flow: notify user to open door to max angle and press a key.

nodes.title: Door Calibration Progress
nodes.summary: Blocking 10-second progress bar while calibrating; a follow-up success tick is shown.

nodes.title: Door Calibration Complete
nodes.summary: Calibration complete; return to main menu.

nodes.title: End of flow (optional shutdown)
nodes.summary: Optional termination/shutdown point for the flow (not used in regular operation).

edges.label: Any key press to exit DND
Any key press to exit DND
Open door to max; press key to continue
